DOC.brief_title: Vitamin B12 Aromatase Inhibitors Musculoskeletal Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Objectives : . To assess whether daily oral Vitamin B12 decrease average joint pain woman aromatase inhibitor-associated musculoskeletal symptom ( AIMSS ) , measure baseline , 6 week 12 week modify Brief Pain Inventory Short Form ( BPI-SF ) .
